column5: Got some new toys for the boat. Now I just have to wait until spring to give em a workout. The troots can't hide from me now.
You will be happy with those units !
Sweet units Dave. I wonder if I should mount 2 on the toon. One for when they are under me, and one for seeing whats coming.LOL

Sweet units Dave. I wonder if I should mount 2 on the toon. One for when they are under me, and one for seeing whats coming.LOL  Great idea!!! I only use one on the toon and the kayak. I should  upgrade!!!!
Nice equipment but why would you need it up there...they don't hide, they jump into the boat
Nice equipment but why would you need it up there...they don't hide, they jump into the boat   Looking for sunken sleds, quads and trucks!!!!
